content.rendered:
WordPress.TV just posted the presentation Kevin and I did at WordCamp NYC 2012. This was the first time we demonstrated Piklist to an audience and the response was more than we could hope for.  The video shows off the power of Piklist and what can be built with it, using simple arrays for fields. Please note that the code we are showing in the video is actually simpler today than it was at WordCamp.

You can also view on WordPress.tv.
